sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail has been groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 3, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/1 and 2/2.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Great day today at Huron Meadows’ Bucks Run. Skied classic for about 50 min. Double set of tracks was great. I found the tracks fast and with good grip for the kick. I used A skis. Saw fewer skaters than usual, not sure why, but the skate deck seemed great. Connector to club house was in great shape.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The red & blue trails were groomed up nicely after yesterday's snowfall. We skate skied both this morning while the current round of snow was falling which slowed things down a lot.

nubsNob.liftsOpen: 6 lifts, Space Worm and the rope tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power-tilled and tracked this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Over two inches of snow landed at Nub's Nob this morning. The majority of this snow is sitting on top of the grooming. Many of the Green Circle runs will be groomed again this morning. The Petoskey Ski Team is hosting a high school meet this morning on Smokey and Valley. This afternoon there is a middle school meet on Birch Run. The lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
